Key:
Mm...mm...? Was that the school bell? Crap... Did I
fall asleep?

(My memory is hazy. But I guess that means today was
peaceful enough.)

All right, no point in staying here. I guess I can go
home now.
Oh, a text. Who could it be?

You're late, Shido. How long do you plan on making
me wait? Swiftly make your way to the location where
we are to meet.

Kaguya? Did we make plans together? Hmm... I don't
remember.
Whoa, another one. This time... it's from Yuzuru.

Verify. The location we are to meet is the rooftop.
Kaguya is getting tired of waiting, so I ask you that
you arrive quickly.

Hmm. Yuzuru is saying the same thing. I must have
completely forgotten. I guess I should go.

You're late, Shido. You must not know your place,
making me wait like this... This time, I reluctantly
have come to pick you up. You'd best be thankful!

Waiting eagerly. We were waiting for you, Shido. Did
you have something to do?

(I bumped into Kaguya and Yuzuru on my way there.
Seems like they were heading my way.)
My bad. I guess I fell asleep after class ended.

This is hard to forgive, my servant. Having a siesta
while you make two unrivaled beauties wait... You
shall be cursed from the heavens!

Agreed. Kaguya is right. I don't blame you if you were
tired, but I would like to see some effort from you as
our boyfriend.
...S-Sorry.

(That's right. I'm currently dating Yuzuru and Kaguya.
Just as they suggested... I failed as a boyfriend for
making them wait.)

That's right, Shido. You'd best not tell me that your
siesta was so deep that it's thrown your memories
into the wilderness.

Verify. Kaguya and Yuzuru are your girlfriends. Have
you forgotten your promise?

Y-Yeah, sorry. Seems like I was in a daze. Sorry for
not keeping my promise.
Hmph... So long as you know.

Smile. For Shido to be half asleep... It may rain
tomorrow.

Hey, I said I'm sorry... Let me make it up to you
guys. I'll treat you out. Let's go somewhere. We can
do anything.
Hehe... Shido. A man will keep his word, right?
Verify. You said anything, right? Then brace yourself.
W-Wait. I did say anything, but there is a limit!
(I mean, I don't have much cash on me...)

You need not tell me. I know that. Hehe... But you
did say anything. Some creative thinking may be in
order...
Daydream. You said anything, so then I can...

Do you guys really understand?! Seriously, go easy
on me!
...Who would've thought it'd rain on us suddenly?

Surprised. I really didn't think it would actually
rain. Shido... your powers are scary.

Um, that's not my fault... Do either of you have an
umbrella?

I didn't think it'd rain today, so of course I didn't
bring one.

I thought so. I do have a spare umbrella, but I don't
think all three of us will fit under it.

*gasp*...! Then of course you will be making a
decision under Yamai law.

Agreed. It appears a competition is in order. The
victor will get to walk under Shido's umbrella. The
loser will go home wet.

A reward and a punishment. Very well. I will show you
my capabilities.

(Ah, crap! At this rate, they're going to start their
battle. It's clear things are going to get heated.)

Wait, wait, you two. I thought we were going to go on
a date. Now isn't the time for this.

Hm. You have a point, but... then what should we do?
There is only one umbrella.
Well, you have a point, but...

(Man, it'll be difficult to borrow an umbrella from
someone. And... I don't want people to see two girls
serving me.)

I wonder if there's another way... I can't call for a
cab, and I feel bad asking Kotori to bring me an
umbrella.

Suggestion. In that case, why don't you consider the
competition, Shido?
Huh? Me?

Affirmative. You've done it before. Regardless, we
will need you to be the judge.

I see. Impressive, Yuzuru. I'd say that is a good
idea. Shido, you must select a competition that is
stimulating and thrilling.

(Stimulating and thrilling? I feel like they kinda
mean the same thing... But when they get like this,
I need to think of something or they won't budge.)

Heh. Very well.. If that's the case, then Shido Itsuka
will decide the competition between the Yamai Sisters!

You've awoken... Dear referee. It is your role to
facilitate the commencement of our holy battle!
Excited. I wonder what you will come up with.

Silence, you two. I will be announcing it now. The
focus of the battle will be...
*gulp*...
Excited. I'm so curious...
Okay. Next it's your turn Kaguya.
Oh! Caterpillar!
Verify. Then. Insect.

Another insect. Hmm... what can I think of... Gosh,
then this will be a strategic pass!

Unfortunately, Kaguya... You've passed three times
already so you can't pass anymore.
Petition. Now you're next. It's your turn, Kaguya.

GGRRRRR...! Shido, this isn't stimulating nor
thrilling! This is just a word association game!

Yeah. But look outside. Is there anything else we can
do that doesn't require much preparation and will end
quickly?
Well, that's true, but...

Then do you want to do Rock-Paper-Scissors? That'll
end quick.
No, that's too fast. I don't like it.

Request. Kaguya, it's your turn. It's pathetic watching
you trying to buy time like this.

I-I'm not buying time! I was just looking for a noble
word befitting of the Yamai.
Oh... Yarn!
Point. You just used that word earlier. Right, Shido?
Yes. You said it four words ago. I recorded it.

*whimper* Yuzuru, it's so not fair that you keep
choosing the same category!
Sneer. Not fair? This is a tactic.

*whimper* Why can't I use words that resonate in my
heart, like blood seal"..."
Well, those are the rules. And blood seal...?
Hehe. Blood has always been used to sign contracts.
Oh! Blood sugar!
Oh. Related to blood stream. You're good.

(Well... I guess they're not words a high school
student should come up with. Kaguya seems to think
otherwise. I have a feeling the response will be...)
Easy. Then hot-blooded.

(Seems like she was anticipating it. Yuzuru had a
response within two seconds. Kaguya, what are you
going to do now? There's no turning back.)
I-I'm trying to think of a word. Hmm...
...WAHHHH! This is so wrong! I can't do it anymore.

Advice. Give it up, Kaguya. If you cry and ask for
forgiveness now, I will let you in the umbrella.
Grrr. Not yet...

Delight. You look so adorable when you're vexed. I
will allow you to think for a moment.
(They really are close.)

(Because they're like that, maybe that's why it
doesn't feel as weird that the three of us are
dating.)

(But there are moments where I feel like I will have
to choose one or the other. But when that happens,
will I be able to choose? Either Kaguya or Yuzuru...?)
Ah, um... Hmm. OH!
Look, look! Shido, Yuzuru!
Hm? What is it?
(Kaguya was pointing to...)
Wonderment...

Whoa. It seemed that the rain let up. It must have
just been passing by.

Hehe, and now it will be no problem if we do not
have Shido's Regenschirm Umbrella.

Correction. Regenschirm is umbrella in German.
Umbrella is English.

Sh-Shut up! I did that on purpose! It was just for
fun!

Doubt. Well, I guess I'll let you off the hook for
that. Anyways, it seems like it won't rain again for a
while. What were the results of the battle...?

Well, there's nothing to bet on anymore, so why don't
we just call it a draw?

Sigh. Very well. I couldn't drive her into a corner. I
was close.
YAY!

Hehe... Yuzuru, you got lucky. I had prepared a word
of despair that would have annihilated you...

Then Kaguya, we can continue just a little longer,
if you wish? Let's settle the score.

Oh! The sunset is calling me! Let's go, Shido, Yuzuru.
We must run like the wind.
Haha. She ran for it.

Agreed. She ran. Kaguya running with her tail wagging
like that is so cute.
Hurry up, you two! We won't have time for our date!
Request. Wait, Kaguya. I'm on my way.

(Hearing Kaguya's voice, Yuzuru immediately moved
toward her. Before I knew it, they were already
walking together, side-by-side.)
Gosh, I never get bored when I'm with you two.
Shido, hurry up! You might miss curfew.
Request. Hehe... Let's go, Shido.
I'm on my way!
(And so I walked, but...)

(Because of the rain, there were puddles
everywhere...)

(Whoa, something inappropriate is showing in the
puddles. Do you guys not notice?!)
What is the matter, Shido? Hurry!

Doubt. Is something the matter, Shido? Do you need
to say anything?

W-Well no, that's not it. Actually, you guys should
look down...
Huh...? AH!
Understood. Shido, why didn't you warn us?

N-No, I didn't see anything. If you understand now,
hurry up and go.

Hehe... What are you embarrassed over? We are dating.
This is not a big deal.
Wha...?
Agreed. If you'd like, you can see it yourself directly.
D-Don't be a fool! I'm going ahead of you guys!
Hey wait, Shido. Don't leave us behind!
Request. Please wait for us, Shido.

(And so our love life continues. But honestly, I feel
like nothing much has changed from the time before
we started dating.)
What's the matter, Shido? You seem deep in thought.
Does it seem that way?

Agreed. Yuzuru thinks so, too. You seemed to have
something on your mind before we left school.

You guys see right through me, huh? Well, I was
thinking about something.
Which is?

Are you two happy being with me? I mean, I've never
dated two girls at the same time, so I don't get it.

I mean, I enjoy spending time with just the three of
us, but it's kind of the same as before. So I was
wondering if you were satisfied with everything.
I see. You were worried about that, huh?
Sorry. I know it kinda sounds pathetic.

Deny. That is not true. I am very happy to hear you
worry for us. However...

We are very happy to be with you, Shido. Today,
tomorrow, and the day after. I always want us to be
together. Therefore... Shido, you must not worry.
Kaguya, Yuzuru... I see. Got it. Thanks you two.

H-Hmph. If there's something you're worried about,
you can ask us anything. I mean we're...
Affirmative. We are dating.
Hey, I was going to say that!
Supremacy. First come, first served.

Let me ask you. Shido, um... is it fun for you? Dating
us...

Question. Yuzuru wants to know, too. Shido, is this
relationship painful for you?
It's fun. That's for sure.
Honestly, I don't really know.

It's fun. That I can say for sure. If not, then I
wouldn't have chosen you two.

But you're right. I'm lucky that this is what I'm
stressed about.
That's not true. I'm glad you told us.

Agreed. Yuzuru, too. If you're worried about anything,
we want to think it through with you.
I-I see. That makes me happy, but...
When you guys put it that way, it makes me blush.
Y-You fool. We're just as embarrassed.
Affirmative. You two are bright red.
What are you talking about? So are you, Yuzuru.

Hehehe... You've made a mistake, Yuzuru. That makes
you super cute!
Agreed. I guess that is the case.
To be quite honest, I don't know.
Shido...

Oh, don't get me wrong. It's not that I don't want to
be with you guys anymore.

Understood. Because you're dating us, you're just
worried about our relationship.
I see... I guess that makes sense.

Doubt. Kaguya, do you really understand? This is a
relationship between a man and woman.
H-How rude. I know that much. I-I read a lot of manga.

Scorn. Read a lot of manga... You must not conflate
fiction with reality, Kaguya.
Y-You don't have much experience either, Yuzuru!

Rebuttal. That is not true for Yuzuru. I have much
experience.

That was such a lie that I don't even know where to
begin.
Pff. Ahahaha...
Shido...? What's the matter?
Thanks, you two. For worrying about me.
Question. I have no idea what you're talking about.
Me, neither. I didn't mean it like that.

Haha, right. Sorry for bringing this up while we're on
a date. Thank you, though...

N-No need to thank us. You can show your appreciation
through your actions.
Return. You're welcome. Let's get going.

(After having the two hear me out, I felt a little
better.)

Thanks, you two. Now let's get going. You wanted to
go somewhere, right?

I am looking for a writing implement that stores
the god of education...
Idea. Yuzuru wants to go to a café.

So the supply store and a café... Got it. I'll go
anywhere with you two.

Oh, come to think of it... You were going to buy us
something, weren't you?
Agreed. You were going to treat us.
Y-Yeah. I guess we'll take turns.

Hahaaa. I see, I see. Let's see what I should have you
gift me.

Pending question. It seems like we will need your
wallet to make an appearance.
Seriously, guys. Go easy on me!
What... did you say?

Guess. You knew that this was going to happen,
didn't you?
Well, not exactly, but...

(Dating them is a challenge, but so much happens
that it's fun. During times like these, though... it's
pretty tough on my wallet...)
I guess I'll have to man up. *sigh*...
